description: SPACE FOR SWANA is a communal space spotlighting Palestinian voices, fundraising for Gaza, and platforming SWANA artists through a decolonial and feminist cultural programme.

factsheet.heading: SPACE FOR SWANA
paragraphs: SPACE FOR SWANA is a communal space for artists, organisers and activists to connect and host meaningful events. A space for radical thinkers to express themselves freely and fundraise for urgent causes. A space to unite hands, hearts and souls in solidarity with Palestine and other oppressed peoples.

3EIB will host the space, and design the cultural programme in direct collaboration with Palestinian artists and SWANA community organisers. We will curate through a decolonial and feminist lens, and each month will have a different theme inspired by the steps needed to imagine a free Palestine, and liberation for all.

factsheet.heading: All Ears & Resolve Collective
paragraphs: SPACE FOR SWANA is designed by All Ears: a collective that facilitates the making of socially conscious spaces and the objects that go in them, in collaboration with Resolve Collective: an Interdisciplinary design collective using Art, Architecture, Engineering and Technology to address social issues in the built environment. All materials are re-purposed or up-cycled through The Material Store.

name: SPACE FOR SWANA
